# Introduction

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
sludge <- read_csv("tbl-01-faecal-sludge-analysis.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(sludge)
```

```{r}
sludge |> 
  filter(!is.na(users)) |> 
  group_by(system, location) |> 
  summarise(
    mean_users = mean(users),
    sd_users = sd(users),
    mean_ts = mean(ts),
    sd_ts = sd(ts)
  )
```
